ComicInfo.Title: Hope I Packed a Change of Underwear!; Power Surge; Fathom: Kiani; Soulfire Preview
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hope I Packed a Change of Underwear!: Theo finds himself in a strange place without Ange or Dev to give him advice.
Power Surge: Cole discovers he has magic... and can take it from others.
Fathom: Kiani: Anya confronts Kiani about her power.
Soulfire Preview: Malikai reads an old storybook.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:24:45. [Issue ID 355044]
